name: 7th Global Conference on Data Science and Machine Learning
content: We are delighted to announce the "7thGlobal Conference on Data Science and Machine Learning" which will be held on December 05-06, 2022; in Dubai, UAE The theme for the conference is "Discovering Technological Advancements in Data Science and Machine Learning" This conference, Data Science 2022, has been intended to benefit students, professors, exhibitors, tech professionals, scientists, data analysts, and entrepreneurs from all around the world. The Data Science 2022 conference will provide an opportunity to debate the most recent advancements in data science, computer security, data analytics, computer networking, machine learning, cloud computing, and other fields. Data Science 2022 will attract a large number of delegates from all across the world. We ask that each of you take an active role in the event and contribute to making it a huge success. We anticipate your enthusiastic participation in Data Science 2022.
